Package controller

Class SlideshowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SlideshowController
  • public class SlideshowController
extends java.lang.Object
    The SlideshowController class is responsible for handling user interactions for the scene Slideshow (Slideshow.fxml). This scene occurs when the user clicks start slideshow within the InsideAlbum scene.
    Author:
    Vincent Phung, William McFarland
